channel.title: CVE Feed for Revmakx -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Revmakx -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49684|2024-10-23T18:51:50.168Z -- revmakx -- backup%20and%20staging%20by%20wp%20time%20capsule
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Revmakx Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule allows Object Injection.This issue affects Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule: from n/a through 1.22.21.

item.title: CVE-2024-48020|2024-10-11T18:34:19.857Z -- revmakx -- backup%20and%20staging%20by%20wp%20time%20capsule
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Revmakx Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule: from n/a through 1.22.21.

item.title: CVE-2024-34816|2024-08-02T02:59:22.647Z -- revmakx -- wpcal.io%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20meeting%20scheduler
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Revmakx WPCal.Io – Easy Meeting Scheduler.This issue affects WPCal.Io – Easy Meeting Scheduler: from n/a through 0.9.5.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-38770|2024-08-01T20:57:05.246Z -- revmakx -- backup%20and%20staging%20by%20wp%20time%20capsule
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Revmakx Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule allows Privilege Escalation, Authentication Bypass.This issue affects Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule: from n/a through 1.22.20.
